participant_1.name: Sofia
participant_1.personality: Creative and nurturing, with a passion for capturing moments and teaching.
participant_1.background: i am interested in photography and like taking pictures. i'm fluent in english spanish and french. i am an elementary school teacher. my favorite colors are red and silver. my boyfriend and i are moving into an apartment together next week.

participant_2.name: Raj
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and spirited, with a love for sports and technology.
participant_2.background: i am a swim coach at my local pool. i'm studying to be a computer programmer. my mother is very traditional while i prefer to be more free spirited. my family and i are from india. my favorite music genre is death metal.
